title: Introduction
content: Introduction rbx-faker is a library that mocks Roblox user data, inspired by faker-js.

interface UserInfo { description: string created: string isBanned: boolean externalAppDisplayName?: string hasVerifiedBadge: boolean id: number name: string displayName: string }  Gets some user info from the users list.

title: getUserId​
content: </> Faker.getUserId() → number Gets some user id from the users list.

title: getUsername​
content: </> Faker.getUsername() → string Gets some username from the users list.

title: getDisplayName​
content: </> Faker.getDisplayName() → string Gets some display name from the users list.

title: getUserThumbnail​
content: </> Faker.getUserThumbnail( thumbnailType: Enum.ThumbnailType, thumbnailSize: Enum.ThumbnailSize ) → string Gets some user thumbnail from the users list.
interface MockPlayer { UserId: number Name: string DisplayName: string AccountAge: number }  Creates a mock player.

title: createList​
content: </> Faker.createList( fn: () → TReturn, count: number ) → {TReturn} Creates an array of length count filled with the return value of fn. (fn is called each iteration)

title: createUniqueList​
content: </> Faker.createUniqueList( fn: () → TReturn, count: number ) → {TReturn} Creates an array of length count filled with the return of fn. (fn is called each iteration, and the table cannot contain duplicate values)
